goals.description: The user's goals (fitness, study, mental health, productivity, etc.).

preferredTime.description: The user's preferred time for habits.

levelTitle.description: A descriptive title for the user's level or status.

Habit.title: Habit
Habit.description: Represents a habit that a user wants to track.

name.description: The name of the habit (e.g., Drink Water, Exercise).

priority.description: The priority level of the habit.

status.description: The current status of the habit for the day.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the habit.

startDate.description: The date the habit was created.

HabitRecord.title: Habit Record
HabitRecord.description: Represents a daily record of a habit.

date.description: The date of the habit record.

status.description: The status of the habit for that day.

text.description: The text of the motivational quote.

author.description: The author of the motivational quote.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Uses path-based ownership for private data. The userId parameter corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/habits/{habitId}.description: Stores habits created by the user. Nested under the user document to establish clear ownership.

/users/{userId}/habits/{habitId}/records.description: Stores daily records for each habit, nested under the habit document.

/motivational_quotes/{quoteId}.description: Stores motivational quotes in a globally readable collection.
